content: No, I think I've got it covered. Thanks for the suggestions and advice! I'll make sure to choose a simple yet elegant design and a font that fits her style. I'm excited to see the final product and present it to her on her birthday. By the way, I've been doing some budgeting and tracking my expenses, and I'm happy to say that I've been staying within my budget for gifts lately. For example, I recently got my sister a nice silver necklace with her birthstone for around $50, which was within my budget.
